title: Apply the Latest Stash
description: In Git, a stash is a way to save changes that are not yet ready to be committed. It allows you to temporarily save your work and switch to another branch or commit without losing any changes. When you're ready to continue working on your changes, you can apply the stash to your working directory. In this challenge, you will learn how to apply the latest stash to your Git repository.

meta.title: Git Stash | Applying the Latest Stash
meta.description: Learn how to apply the latest stash in your Git repository and restore your unsaved changes without losing any work.
meta.keywords: Git, Git Stash, Stash, Version Control, Unsaved Changes, Restore Changes

verify.name: Verify for successful application
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 应用最新贮藏
i18n.description: 在 Git 中，贮藏是一种保存尚未准备好提交的更改的方法。它允许你临时保存工作，然后切换到另一个分支或提交，而不会丢失任何更改。当你准备好继续处理更改时，可以将贮藏应用到工作目录。在这个挑战中，你将学习如何将最新的贮藏应用到你的 Git 仓库。

meta.title: Git 贮藏 | 应用最新贮藏
meta.description: 学习如何在你的 Git 仓库中应用最新贮藏，并恢复未保存的更改而不丢失任何工作。
meta.keywords: Git、Git 贮藏、贮藏、版本控制、未保存的更改、恢复更改

verify.name: 验证应用是否成功
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
